forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 68, with temperatures falling to around 66 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 3 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 51. West southwest wind 3 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
The sun shines down on Downtown San Francisco, casting a warm glow over the city streets. With a projected high around 68 degrees, the atmosphere invites a sense of ease and brightness. Light winds from the west-southwest drift gently, adding a refreshing element to the day. As the afternoon progresses, temperatures will slide just a touch, settling around 66, creating a perfect backdrop for leisurely strolls along the Embarcadero or a quiet afternoon respite at one of the local parks.

Tonight promises a clear canvas, where the deep blue sky will stretch above, and temperatures will dip to a comfortable 51 degrees. The gentle breeze continues, maintaining a delightful ambiance to the evening. As for attire, consider a light jacket or sweater for those who might venture into the cooler hours. The clarity of the day opens avenues for exploration—perhaps a visit to a bustling café or a quiet moment spent savoring the view from Twin Peaks. Engage with the city’s pulse and embrace the tranquility that this lovely day offers, perhaps taking a moment to watch the sunset wash the skyline in hues of gold and lavender.
